issue.title: [Rust] Enhance documentation for arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4304](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The documentation for arrow crate (https://docs.rs/arrow/0.12.0/arrow/) is not complete. We should add more content to it to help people who want to use the crate.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16792810) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Do you want to do this for 0.13?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16792814) by Chao Sun (csun):*
I think we can push this to 0.14 since some of the work has been done in some other JIRAs such as ARROW-4245.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16861481) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Is there a reasonable scope of work here for 0.14.0?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16861514) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Sorry for the delay. I think the scope is not that big. Let me try to push this in 0.14.0.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16861529) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
`[~csun]` see also https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5497 where I hope to wrangle the other language docs. LMK if you want to get the Rust docs published at arrow.apache.org/docs/rust alongside the others and I can help.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16861536) by Chao Sun (csun):*
`[~npr]` Yes it would be great if we can publish the Rust doc on arrow.apache.org. Let me file a JIRA for that and perhaps you can give us some pointer on how to do that.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=16861631) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
If it is possible to put prose documentation in the main Sphinx project that would be ideal. Generated API docs are something different and can always be linked at docs/rust/api or something

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4304?focusedCommentId=17076494) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6828
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6828>
